message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $135, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $135 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $125.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $130, but I'm not going to go any lower than that.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but $130 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $125, and I'm willing to pay that price if you're willing to meet me there.
I understand you're really trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm not willing to go below $130, but I'm willing to give you a slight discount to $128. That's the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $128 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $126. Can you consider that?
I've already met you halfway twice, Bob, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $128. I'm willing to throw in a small bonus with the product if you're willing to meet me at $128.

I appreciate the bonus offer, Alice, but I'm still not willing to meet you at $128. I'm willing to pay $125, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider buying from John for $100.
